1.1.0.name: wordpress/tweetly-updater
1.1.0.description: Tweetly Updater is a Wordpress plugin that updates Twitter when you create or edit a blog entry, it uses the bit.ly service for short urls. It can use your tags and categories to add shashtags to your tweets. You can optionally include pages in your updates.
